executable.cmd: ros2 run rmf_demo_tasks request_loop -s start_A -f goal_A -r tinyRobot -n 5
ros2 run rmf_demo_tasks delayed_request_loop -s start_B -f goal_B -r tinyRobot -n 5 --delay 2
ros2 run rmf_demo_tasks delayed_request_loop -s start_C -f goal_C -r tinyRobot -n 5 --delay 4
ros2 run rmf_demo_tasks delayed_request_loop -s start_D -f goal_D -r tinyRobot -n 5 --delay 6
